Package model

Interface BuildingCompanyModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildingCompany
public interface BuildingCompanyModel
The BuildingCompanyModel interface defines the operations that a building company should support. Implementing classes or interfaces should provide functionality related to ongoing and finished projects, as well as report generation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNewProject(Project project)
    Adds a new project to the building company's project list.
    void
    deleteOngoingProject(Project project)
    Deletes an ongoing project from the building company's project list.

    Edits the status of a finished project.

    Generates a report based on specified criteria and returns the list of reports.
    void

    Lists all finished projects, displaying their information.
    void

    Lists all ongoing projects, displaying their information.

      Lists all finished projects, displaying their information.

      Adds a new project to the building company's project list.

    • editOngoingProjectData

      void editOngoingProjectData(Project projectToEdit, Project projectWithNewData)
      Edits the data of an ongoing project.
      Parameters:
      projectToEdit - The project to be edited.
      projectWithNewData - The project with the new data.

    • editStatusOfFinishedProject

      void editStatusOfFinishedProject(Project project)
      Edits the status of a finished project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project whose status is to be edited.

    • deleteOngoingProject

      void deleteOngoingProject(Project project)
      Deletes an ongoing project from the building company's project list.
      Parameters:

    • generateReport

      ReportList generateReport(MyDate fromDate, MyDate toDate, Sort.Order order, Sort.SortingCategory sortingCategory, Sort.ProjectType projectType)
      Generates a report based on specified criteria and returns the list of reports.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - The starting date for the report.
      toDate - The ending date for the report.
      order - The order in which to sort the report.
      sortingCategory - The category by which to sort the report.
      projectType - The type of project to include in the report.
      Returns:
      The list of generated reports.
